verses.verse: And <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H7927>Shechem<s%>: for all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> to make him <S%H4427>king<s%>.

And it came to pass, when <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5028>Nebat<s%>, who was yet in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, <S%H8085>heard<s%> of it, (for he was <S%H1272>fled<s%> from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>, and <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>;)

That they <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> him. And <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> and all the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%>, and <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Thy <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H7185>made<s%> our <S%H5923>yoke<s%> <S%H7185>grievous<s%>: now therefore make thou the <S%H7186>grievous<s%> <S%H5656>service<s%> of thy <S%H1>father<s%>, and his <S%H3515>heavy<s%> <S%H5923>yoke<s%> which he <S%H5414>put<s%> upon us, <S%H7043>lighter<s%>, and we will <S%H5647>serve<s%> thee.
And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, <S%H3212>Depart<s%> yet for <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, then come <S%H7725>again<s%> to me. And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3212>departed<s%>.

¶ And <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> <S%H3289>consulted<s%> with the old <S%H2205>men<s%>, that <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> while he yet <S%H2416>lived<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, How do ye <S%H3289>advise<s%> that I <S%H7725>may<s%> <S%H1697>answer<s%> this <S%H5971>people<s%>?

And they <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto him, <S%H559>saying<s%>, If thou wilt be a <S%H5650>servant<s%> unto this <S%H5971>people<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%>, and wilt <S%H5647>serve<s%> them, and <S%H6030>answer<s%> them, and <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> to them, then they will be thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> for <S%H3117>ever<s%>.

But he <S%H5800>forsook<s%> the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of the old <S%H2205>men<s%>, which they had <S%H3289>given<s%> him, and <S%H3289>consulted<s%> with the young <S%H3206>men<s%> that were grown <S%H1431>up<s%> with him, and which <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him:

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, What counsel <S%H3289>give<s%> ye that we <S%H7725>may<s%> <S%H1697>answer<s%> this <S%H5971>people<s%>, who have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H7043>Make<s%> the <S%H5923>yoke<s%> which thy <S%H1>father<s%> did <S%H5414>put<s%> upon us <S%H7043>lighter<s%>?

And the young <S%H3206>men<s%> that were grown <S%H1431>up<s%> with him <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto him, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Thus shalt thou <S%H559>speak<s%> unto this <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto thee, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Thy <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H3513>made<s%> our <S%H5923>yoke<s%> <S%H3513>heavy<s%>, but make thou it <S%H7043>lighter<s%> unto us; thus shalt thou <S%H1696>say<s%> unto them, My <S%H6995>little<s%> finger shall be <S%H5666>thicker<s%> than my <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H4975>loins<s%>.

And now whereas my <S%H1>father<s%> did <S%H6006>lade<s%> you with a <S%H3515>heavy<s%> <S%H5923>yoke<s%>, I will <S%H3254>add<s%> to your <S%H5923>yoke<s%>: my <S%H1>father<s%> hath <S%H3256>chastised<s%> you with <S%H7752>whips<s%>, but I will <S%H3256>chastise<s%> you with <S%H6137>scorpions<s%>.

¶ So <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, as the <S%H4428>king<s%> had <S%H1696>appointed<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Come to me <S%H7725>again<s%> the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>.
And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7186>roughly<s%>, and <S%H5800>forsook<s%> the old <S%H2205>men's<s%> <S%H6098>counsel<s%> that they <S%H3289>gave<s%> him;

And <S%H1696>spake<s%> to them after the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of the young <S%H3206>men<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, My <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H3513>made<s%> your <S%H5923>yoke<s%> <S%H3513>heavy<s%>, and I will <S%H3254>add<s%> to your <S%H5923>yoke<s%>: my <S%H1>father<s%> also <S%H3256>chastised<s%> you with <S%H7752>whips<s%>, but I will <S%H3256>chastise<s%> you with <S%H6137>scorpions<s%>.

Wherefore the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> not unto the <S%H5971>people<s%>; for the <S%H5438>cause<s%> was from the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, that he might <S%H6965>perform<s%> his <S%H1697>saying<s%>, which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H281>Ahijah<s%> the <S%H7888>Shilonite<s%> unto <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5028>Nebat<s%>.

¶ <S%H7725>So<s%> when all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> not unto them, the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1697>answered<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, What <S%H2506>portion<s%> have we in <S%H1732>David<s%>? neither have we <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> in the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse<s%>: to your <S%H168>tents<s%>, O <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: now <S%H7200>see<s%> to thine own <S%H1004>house<s%>, <S%H1732>David<s%>. So <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3212>departed<s%> unto their <S%H168>tents<s%>.
But as for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> which <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> over them.

Then <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H151>Adoram<s%>, who was over the <S%H4522>tribute<s%>; and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7275>stoned<s%> him with <S%H68>stones<s%>, that he <S%H4191>died<s%>. Therefore <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> made <S%H553>speed<s%> to get him <S%H5927>up<s%> to his <S%H4818>chariot<s%>, to <S%H5127>flee<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.
So <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6586>rebelled<s%> against the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

And it came to pass, when all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> was come <S%H7725>again<s%>, that they <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> him unto the <S%H5712>congregation<s%>, and made him <S%H4427>king<s%> over all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: there was none that <S%H310>followed<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>, <S%H2108>but<s%> the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> only.

¶ And when <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> was <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, he <S%H6950>assembled<s%> all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, with the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8084>fourscore<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> chosen <S%H977>men<s%>, which were <S%H6213%H4421>warriors<s%>, to <S%H3898>fight<s%> against the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, to <S%H7725>bring<s%> the <S%H4410>kingdom<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>.
But the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> came unto <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H559>Speak<s%> unto <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>, <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and unto all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, and to the <S%H3499>remnant<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, Ye shall not go <S%H5927>up<s%>, nor <S%H3898>fight<s%> against your <S%H251>brethren<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: <S%H7725>return<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H1004>house<s%>; for this <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H1961>is<s%> from me. They <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> therefore to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H3212>depart<s%>, according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

¶ Then <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, and <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> therein; and went <S%H3318>out<s%> from thence, and <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H6439>Penuel<s%>.
And <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart<s%>, Now shall the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>:

If this <S%H5971>people<s%> go <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, then shall the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of this <S%H5971>people<s%> turn <S%H7725>again<s%> unto their <S%H113>lord<s%>, even unto <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and they shall <S%H2026>kill<s%> me, and go <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>.

Whereupon the <S%H4428>king<s%> took <S%H3289>counsel<s%>, and <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5695>calves<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, It is too <S%H7227>much<s%> for you to go <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>: behold thy <S%H430>gods<s%>, O <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, which brought thee <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.
And he <S%H7760>set<s%> the <S%H259>one<s%> in <S%H1008>Beth-el<s%>, and the <S%H259>other<s%> <S%H5414>put<s%> he in <S%H1835>Dan<s%>.
And this <S%H1697>thing<s%> became a <S%H2403>sin<s%>: for the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to worship <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H259>one<s%>, even unto <S%H1835>Dan<s%>.

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> an <S%H1004>house<s%> of high <S%H1116>places<s%>, and <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H3548>priests<s%> of the <S%H7098>lowest<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>, which were not of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%>.

And <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> <S%H6213>ordained<s%> a <S%H2282>feast<s%> in the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>, on the <S%H2568%H6240>fifteenth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2320>month<s%>, like unto the <S%H2282>feast<s%> that is in <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and he <S%H5927>offered<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%>. So <S%H6213>did<s%> he in <S%H1008>Beth-el<s%>, <S%H2076>sacrificing<s%> unto the <S%H5695>calves<s%> that he had <S%H6213>made<s%>: and he <S%H5975>placed<s%> in <S%H1008>Beth-el<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> of the high <S%H1116>places<s%> which he had <S%H6213>made<s%>.

So he <S%H5927>offered<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%> which he had <S%H6213>made<s%> in <S%H1008>Beth-el<s%> the <S%H2568%H6240>fifteenth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>, even in the <S%H2320>month<s%> which he had <S%H908>devised<s%> of his own <S%H3820>heart<s%>; and <S%H6213>ordained<s%> a <S%H2282>feast<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: and he <S%H5927>offered<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and burnt <S%H6999>incense<s%>.
